title: GPT-4o — AI Tool Review
description: GPT-4o is OpenAI's omnimodel — natively multimodal, processing text, images, and audio simultaneously with near-instant response times. GPT-4o ('omni') is OpenAI's flagship model that natively handles text, images, and audio in a single model. It's the backbone of ChatGPT, offering vision (analyze images/documents), voice conversation, real-time translation, and text generation. GPT-4o mini is a fast, cheap version available free. GPT-4o is now available free to ChatGPT users with rate limits. Highlights: Native multimodal processing. Fastest GPT-4 class model. Available on free ChatGPT tier. Vision, voice, and text in one model. Strong API performance.
